title: 04/09/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/09/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys talk about a bunch of things going on in the

sports world, from baseball controversy to the Masters, to the NFL draft. Mike Tirico, who checks in from Augusta talks about the first round yesterday as well as how Bryson DeChambeau is good for the sport of golf. In hour two, Tom Curran clarifies any rumors that the Patriots would move up in the draft to take a quarterback. Keith Hernandez jumps on the show to talk about how he had a problem with the ending as well as what’s will transpire in the coming days. And WWE Superstar The Miz calls in to discuss his match up in Wrestlemania this weekend

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
